amendment.description: To provide funding for the Memphis Medical Center light rail extension project.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1958 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1958 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S13121-13122; text: CR S13121) To provide funding for the Memphis Medical Center light rail extension project.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1958 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1958 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Frist.
